CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in New Pittsburgh Courier, July 22, 1967, pg. 13 reads: "The main ballroom of the Hilton Hotel was packed the night before the Fourth when the Pittsburgh Chapter of Squaws, Inc., entertained at a gay "Cotton Extravaganza."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of seven women, one wearing two toned striped sleeveless dress, and eight men, posed around long sofa in Hilton Hotel for Squaws' "Cotton Extravaganza"
